name: Jack and Jerk: Off The Game 2
name_original: Jack and Jerk: Off The Game 2
description:
Make sure to play the first game before diving into the second one, you have been warned... https://doodle-mcsherbert.itch.io/jack-and-jerk

This is the newest instalment in the Jack and Jerk: Off The Game Cinematic Universe. This game is WAY MORE SCARIER than the last game. It will make you go AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA so be beware and take caution... And make sure to play the first game first and this second or else Jack, Jerk, and their new friends will hide under your stairs and go AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA which makes you go AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA on the stairs and DIE! Additionally, this game is not in 2D, not in 3D, not 4D, not even in 5D. This game is in 6D! I ain't messing with anyone here, this game is the very first 6D GAME EVER and is garneted to BLOW YOUR MIND.

Credits:

  • The original concept: https://itch.io/profile/sebi-tv
  • Coding/Ideas/Character designer: https://sxdg.itch.io/
  • Coding: https://coolingtool.itch.io/  (I can't believe he coded this entire game in his sleep)

(ALSO, I DID NOT MAKE THE GAME YOU DUMMER THAN DUMMY DUMB, I'M JUST THE PUBLISHER)
